QAPair.Question: What is (are) Tailbone trauma - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: You were treated for an injured tailbone . The tailbone is also called the coccyx. It is the small bone at the lower tip of the spine. At home, be sure to follow your health care provider's instructions on how to take care of your tailbone so that it heals well.
